message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I think it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
